website_summaries.verdict: Add a touch of ambiance to an outdoor table for 2 with durable and uniquely designed chairs.
pros: Well built and consistently arrives with properly placed screw holes, to ensure you know this set is made with integrity
Holds up well with a variety of weather conditions
High marks for the weight-bearing structure and enduring design
cons: This pair would be even better if it came with a set of cushions

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a twin-pack. One of the chairs had scratches on it. Amazon was great in the replacement process. The replacement also was scratched. These are aluminum with a thin coat of black paint. When the black paint is scratched, you are down to the silver aluminum. In addition, the chairs need assembly. They are not a single peice structure. Each chair requires 8 bolts, which create opportunity for movement/flex. As a result, these chairs wobble somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: Chillywilly977

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Received and assembled today, not worth the price, might return them. Poor quality with poor finish. The casting has flaws every where, look as a cheap product without manufacturing and quality control . Do not recommend. Seat is not large enough to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Luiz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! Solid, nice looking, great finish & super easy to assemble! Look awesome on my front porch!
customer_reviews.author: PamF

customer_reviews.title: Good looking chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I had read about some people having trouble with the assembly and when I put them together, they would not sit level by themselves. When you sit in them, they level out, but by themselves they rock. Took them apart and put them back together twice more and the same thing. I do love how they sit, but think they shouldn't rock when no one is sitting in them.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Ok...... definitely not what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, not what thought or expected but will make them work for price.
customer_reviews.author: Verified customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE CHAIRS FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The chairs arrived well packed for shipment. I now possess a lifetime supply of bubble wrap. The chairs were easy to assemble and are fairly comfortable for outdoor furniture. I've only had them for a few days and am uncertain how well the painted finish will hold up to the sun, weather, and wear and tear but I'm sure the could easily be spray painted and brought back to an attractive finish.
customer_reviews.author: Spenser Amadeus

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these chairs. I had searched for months for replacement chairs at the table by our pool but everything I saw was very flimsy or very expensive. Not the case with these. They are beautiful, sturdy and I suspect they will last for years. Ours came without all of the bolt covers. I emailed the company and they responded quickly and professionally and FedExed the covers. They follow up on their interactions too. Great folks to work with!
customer_reviews.author: S. T.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 Boxes of Christopher Knight Home 239070 Marietta Outdoor Cast Aluminum Dinning Chairs, Black from Amazon. One of the chair's bolt of one of the left leg-arm is crooked and the threads are not properly done. It is threaded only half way. I cannot put the nut on the bolt. So the chair cannot be assembled. I wrote an e-mail to customersupport@noblehousefurniture,com - that was listed in the package. They cannot do anything since the chairs were bought through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sunita Gulati

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. They were incredibly easy to assemble. Instructions say 2 people are required to assemble but I had no problems putting together by myself (using my own tools made it easier than using the wrench provided). Each chair took about 20 minutes to assemble. These chairs are sturdy and wide. The chairs are comfortable but are hard so I will purchase cushions to enhance the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: High quality chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are high quality cast aluminum. Bolt holes and threads were clean which facilitated easy assembly. I consider them a very good buy and will likely buy from this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great for the price. They ended up being a little narrower than I expected, but they are comfortable without pads. There were a couple of rough spots that needed a little sanding since I cut my hand on a sharp spot. They were packed very well and I am happy with the product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs. I've been looking for decorative patio chairs for a long time. Most were pretty but flimsy, or didn't have handles, a requirement if you intend to curl up with a good book. They're perfect. I'll have them for years. Seller got them her beautifully packaged and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette LaVoy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our need!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs sit outside our sauna at our cottage in the UP. Great place to cool off and enjoy the sunset on the lake! We needed to get chairs that had some weight to withstand the wind that comes from across the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ghiardi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived noticeably scratched and there were 4 missing rubber caps to cover very noticeable screws and bolts on back of chair. Also, the tool that was sent for assembly was the wrong tool (different from the tool shown in directions) and was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Rappeport

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs, but one leg is short
customer_reviews.text: Chairs feel great, and were fairly easy to assemble. One chair has a leg that is short, enough that the levelers on the feet can’t extend far enough to correct the issue.
customer_reviews.author: EMc

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Set is as advertised. Seems sturdy. Easy to assemble. Bought 3 sets to replace sling dining chairs. Best price after much searching
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum is worth the extra expense
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great. Solid, elegant, and heavy enough to not blow away on a windy day. You would do well to stop buying the steel garbage they sell in the home stores. My last set of chairs were rusted, peeling, and unraveling after two years. I expect to have these many years from now.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Nice chairs, easy to assemble. I am a female senior citizen and put these together by myself. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: lindalouise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy chairs.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very sturdy. They are quite attractive and have a very nice seat base. I put them together by myself in just a short time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Nicked up upon receiving
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars Mine cam all nicked up and asked seller and manufacturer to send touch up and never got a response a simple no would have been ok
customer_reviews.author: cassidy retter

customer_reviews.title: Nice all around!
customer_reviews.text: Great care in packaging and assembly directions. Easy to assemble. Like the style and substance of the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: PaRAJ

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find cast aluminum chairs.
customer_reviews.text: The two chairs arrived on time and were well packed with lots of bubble wrap. Not too difficult to put together and only one bolt needed a little bit of filing to smooth it. The chairs looked very nice and we are pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maryelle

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Stylish ,easy to assemble, roomy and comfortable .happywith product choice
customer_reviews.author: bill campbell

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very comfortablel and very durable. They way they are constructed, I imagine they will last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous. Easy to build and sturdy. Really added elegance to my deck. Use with and without cushions. So much more affordable and attractive than others I searched.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Riczu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chairs
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described and very confirmable to sit. Well spent money.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: I love these two chairs
customer_reviews.text: I love these two chairs. They arrived in a box and I had to put them together, but it was very easy and the tool was provided. They are both elegant and sturdy. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect decorative chairs for our front porch; looks like very expensive wrought iron chair that I had been looking at. The black is a great neutral to dress up with seasonal toss pillows. It’s comfy if you do want to sit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Happyface

customer_reviews.title: no rust here
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect for my patio. Will not rust, comfortable. The price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are nice chairs, but we added a seat cushion to make them more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. Gave it 4 stars only because we just put them together. They look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value. Fairly solid and look great on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: LIsa S. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: great product, fast service, outstanding price. Very easy to assemble well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Ver Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these chairs. Easy to put together, comfortable and pretty to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: the chairs are exactly what I wanted and had been unable to find. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: wanda alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect patio chairs
customer_reviews.text: To start, they were boxed up nicely and very well protected. These are easy to put together, just need a little patience if doing it solo like I did. Great paint job, nice weight. You can't beat the price either. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Simply excellent outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs, very comfortable, and easy to put together. Very sturdy-feeling. I believe that they're made of cast aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Max

customer_reviews.title: Good looking chair that requires assembly-Good price
customer_reviews.text: Chairs look good and appear to be of good quality. Won't know for sure until they've been on our beachside balcony for a while. I didn't realize they had to be assembled. I've bought similar chairs before that arrived in one piece & only required the screw-on feet to be added. But, these do come in 4 pieces that require about 8 screws per chair to hold them together. It took 2 of us to do that because one person needs to hold the chair in place while the other screws it together. It took us about an hour but we are older than the average buyer I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, better than the chairs that came with the original dining set.
customer_reviews.text: These chair replaced another set of cast aluminum chairs that one had cracked at the leg so relegated three to occasional chairs on the patio. The new chairs are not as deep front to back as the previous and we love it. The other needed a cushion in the back to prop you up closer to the table. Please these chairs match the table better than the ones we had. So glad we got these and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Desert Rat

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home Hallandale Outdoor Cast Aluminum Chairs, 2-Pcs Set, Black Sand
product_meta.description: The Marietta dining chairs will bring luxury and convenience to your outdoor space. Made from cast aluminum, these durable, high quality chairs feature a mesh seat and backrest. The antique black sand finish is neutral to match any outdoor furniture and will hold up in any weather condition. Whether in your backyard, patio, or deck, you'll enjoy these chairs for years to come. Dimensions: Chair: 24.45" D x 26.20" W x 35.45" H Seat: 17.25" D x 19.25" W x 18.25" H
feature_bullets: Constructed with sturdy powder coated cast aluminum metal
Black sand finish will add elegance to your existing outdoor design
Neutral colors to match any outdoor decor
Intricate mesh seat and backrest for added flare
Easy to assemble (tools and instructions included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars73 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
